function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 through the handling of waste materials from households and quarantine facilities with COVID-19 patients.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission to workers and general population.","Mitigation":"Revision of procedures for waste collection and handling, and implementation of additional risk management actions.","Technologies":"Improved sanitation and waste handling technologies, as well as data monitoring systems for SARS-CoV-2 presence in wastewater.","People":"Workers handling waste, general population, individuals in quarantine facilities.","Owner":"Health authorities, waste management organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of data on SARS-CoV-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector.","Impact":"Increased uncertainty about transmission pathways and ineffective risk management.","Mitigation":"Urgent research to gather data on SARS-CoV-2 prevalence in wastewater, and development of risk management strategies based on the data.","Technologies":"Data monitoring and analysis systems for SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater.","People":"Wastewater management professionals, public health authorities.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Potential aerosol transmission of COVID-19, similar to previous outbreaks like SARS-CoV, necessitating further research and risk management actions.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread through aerosol transmission.","Mitigation":"Conducting research on aerosol transmission of COVID-19 and implementing strategies to mitigate aerosol transmission in indoor environments.","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and aerosol containment technologies.","People":"General population, indoor facility occupants.","Owner":"Health organizations, building management authorities."}]}
